Landing.heroSubtitle: The most interactive way to learn blockchain. Earn cNFTs, gain XP, and join the elite Superteam developers.
Landing.enrollDescription: Join thousands of developers building the future of Solana. Complete courses, earn cNFTs, and level up your skills.
Landing.featureOnchainDescription: Earn compressed NFTs (cNFTs) for every course. Build a verifiable proof-of-skill resume on Solana.
Landing.featureGamifiedDescription: Level up, maintain daily streaks, and climb the global leaderboard. Learning is a competitive sport.
Landing.featureIdeDescription: Write, compile, and deploy Solana programs directly in your browser. Real hands-on experience.
Landing.pathsSubtitle: Curated learning paths to guide you from beginner to expert in Solana development.
Landing.pathFundamentalsDescription: Start from scratch and understand the Solana blockchain inside out.
Landing.pathDefiDescription: Master DeFi protocols and build decentralized finance applications.
Landing.pathSecurityDescription: Find bugs, write audits, protect Solana protocols.
Landing.whySubtitle: Everything you need to become a world-class Solana developer.
Landing.whyInteractiveDescription: Code challenges with integrated editor, real-time feedback and automated tests.
Landing.whyOnchainDescription: Certificates as verifiable cNFTs on Solana — prove your skills on-chain.
Landing.whyGamifiedDescription: Earn XP, keep streaks, climb rankings and unlock achievements.
Landing.whyMultilanguageDescription: Learn in English, Portuguese or Spanish. More languages coming soon.
Landing.ctaTextLoggedIn: Dive back into your courses and keep building on Solana.
Landing.ctaTextLoggedOut: Join the Superteam Brazil community and become a top-tier Solana developer.

Course.enrollDescription: Complete this course to earn a unique cNFT and boost your developer rank.
